mapper.insert: insert into warehouse (warehousecode, warehousename, warehouselocal) values (#{wareHouseCode},#{wareHouseName} ,nvl(#{wareHouselocal, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null))
mapper.select: select warehousecode, warehousename, warehouselocal from warehouse
select warehousecode, warehousename, warehouselocal from warehouse where warehousecode = #{wareHouseCode}
select a.warehousename, a.warehouselocal, b.receivedate, b.sortation, b.quantity, b.material from warehouse a, receive b where b.warehousecode = #{a.wareHouseCode} order by a.warehousename desc
mapper.update: update warehouse set warehousename = nvl(#{wareHouseName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},warehousename) , warehouselocal =nvl(#{wareHouselocal, jdbcType=VARCHAR},warehouselocal) where warehousecode= #{wareHouseCode}
